titleStmt.title: Gospel-worship, or, The right manner of sanctifying the name of God in general and particularly in these three great ordinances, viz. [brace] 1. hearing of the Word, 2. receiving the Lords Supper, 3. prayer / by Jeremiah Burroughs ; being the second of the seven volumns lately published by Thomas Goodwin ... [et al.]
titleStmt.author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page reads: Mr Burroughs Gospel-conversation. Mr Burroughs Gospel-worship.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
